whatIs.title: What is LegalHelp AI Notaries?
whatIs.description: LegalHelp AI Notaries is the specialized DocumentoIQ product designed specifically for notaries. It uses artificial intelligence to analyze extensive notarial documents, identify critical information, and structure relevant data, helping notaries and their teams work with greater precision, speed, and confidence.
whatIs.disclaimer: LegalHelp AI Notaries does not replace the notary. It functions as an intelligent assistant that reduces manual workload and errors in document review.

acts.title: Review of notarial minutes
acts.description: Analysis of notarial minutes to identify key data such as appearing parties, statements, dates, and legal acts, reducing errors in high-frequency documents.

powers.title: Validation of powers of attorney
powers.description: Automatic extraction and validation of information in general or special powers of attorney, identifying grantors, attorneys-in-fact, scopes, and validity, and pointing out possible inconsistencies for the notary's review.

deeds.title: Review of public deeds
deeds.description: Analysis of extensive and complex deeds to identify parties, assets, amounts, backgrounds, and relevant clauses, facilitating review and reducing preparation and validation time.

wills.title: Wills
wills.description: Structured review of wills to identify provisions, heirs, assets, and special conditions, helping to minimize formal errors in legally sensitive documents.
